item.description:
apnews.com
WILTON MANORS, Fla. (AP) — A driver slammed into spectators Saturday at the start of a Pride parade in South Florida, injuring at least two people. item.title: Partygoers, police injured at curfew-busting rave in France...
item.description:
apnews.com
